emenma sanniwedana sewa, sha්rawya drushya sewa, idikirim ha ema injineru sewa, beda harime sewa, thoga welendam, adhyapana sewa parisarika sewa, saukhya ha samaja sewa, sancharaka sewa, nawatha godanagim, sanskruthika ha ki්rada sewa, nawika pa්rawahana sewa aadi washayen pa්radhana ansha 16k yatathe merata bhanda ha sewa welendamaka yedimata indiyawa apeksha karayi.
